name: Ninja Runner [2015]
description:
One of the first games I've made, going all the way back to 2015.

It's a pretty simple (if a little sadistically designed in some places) sidescroller in which the player automatically runs to the right and must press the spacebar at the right times to jump, grabbing as many points as possible along the way. And of course, mess up three times, and it's game over.
